name: ASSOCIATION FOR ACCESSIBLE MEDICINES (FORMERLY GENERIC PHARMACEUTICAL ASSOC.)
description: National trade organization representing the interests of generic drug manufacturers.

- Issues relating to prescription drug abuse.

Issues related to the cost of prescription drugs.
